name: Bouncy Bun
description:
Bouncy Bun is an endless runner where you play as Bunny, a courageous rabbit knight, and hop over the giant carrots.

HOW TO PLAY

Press SPACE to jump, there is a meter on the top left that indicates how much jump power Bunny has left. Once it is depleted, Bunny must touch the ground to regain more jump power!

Press S to restart

Press R to reset your high score

BGM by KiguRoomie, twitter: https://twitter.com/KiguRoomie
